FCPAAUD.original: ~z~A fucking draw, in bowling. What are the odds?
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~他妈打平了，保龄球诶。这他妈也行？

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Shit, Niko. What's the fucking deal? Let's fucking get there already..
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我靠，Niko。这有毛关系？快他妈上路吧...

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Will you take me to the house?
~z~I've had naked chicks on me brain since we talked. I'm pumped, Niko.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~聊完电话，我的脑子里就全是裸体少妇了，Niko。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Fuck, that place ain't bad. It ain't bad at all.
~z~If you spent more time talking to women, and less staring at the internet with your cock in your hand you might get somewhere.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~如果能你多花点时间和女人聊天，少对着屏幕撸管，你是能有所成就的。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Hey, man. Let's go.
~z~Christ, if you'd been any later I probably woulda shot you. Let's move it.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~天哪，你再晚点到，我都想毙了你了。出发吧。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_ARRIVEM_NOTLATE
FCP_ACT_LEAVE_CLUB_GENERIC
~z~Fuck Niko. I don't wanna do this.
FCP_ACT_ARRIVE_BOWL
FCP_ACT_BORED_GETTING
~z~Oh, darts, can't leave the bulleye alone eh? Alright, I'm in.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~噢，飞镖，就是丢不下靶心吗，嗯？好吧，我来。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_DIFF_POOL_YES
~z~If you're in a bar full of women and the only person you're interested in is me, you should start asking yourself some important questions.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~如果你在一个满是女人的酒吧里还只对我感兴趣，你就该问你自己一些重要的问题了。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~I was getting bored of bowling anyway. I was thinking about shooting the pins down at one point.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~保龄球也打腻了。我在想的是一次打倒所有瓶子。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_DARTS_LEAVE_ABANDON
~z~I'm fucked, when you're in a place like that you got no choice but to down the drinks.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我不行了，不过在这种地方怎么能不喝酒呢。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_LEAVE_STRIP_OK
~z~Here it is Niko. See if we remember we were here tomorrow morning.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~到了，Niko。看看我们明早还记不记得自己来过这里吧。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_ARRIVE_CLUB_GENERIC
~z~It don't matter Niko. It's just a fucking game. You're better at shooting people if that's a consolation?
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~没关系，Niko。不过是场游戏而已。你还是更擅长打人，不知道算不算是安慰。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~This like a slice of real European culture or something? Remind me to take you to a jig on our next date.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~这算是真实欧洲文化的一个截面吗？下次记得提醒我带你去看爱尔兰吉格舞。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Didn't they teach you to tell the time, you're fucking late. Let's get a car.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~没人教你看时间的吗，你丫迟到了。去弄辆车来。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Whoa. Where are we? Are we coming in or going out?
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~喔哦，我们在哪儿？这是要进去还是出来？

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_BOWL_LEAVE_WON
~z~Do you get this.
FCP_ACT_ARRIVE_PUB_GENERIC
FCP_ACT_LEAVE_DRINK_INSULT
~z~Shit, Niko. We weren't in there long. My priest'll thank you for preventing me from sinning at least.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我靠，Niko，刚进店没多久吧。至少我的神父会感谢你让我远离罪孽的。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Hey man, so we need some vehicular transport.
~z~Shit, I'm storing those bitches in the bank for later. If you catch my drift.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我靠，我要把这些婊子存银行里备用。不知道你听没听懂。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Good to see you Niko, gimme a call.
~z~You just go to show that no matter what man achieves, we still behave like fucking apes.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~你就是最好的例子，无论人类进化成什么样，我们还是表现的跟猩猩一样。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Fuck me, you don't actually like that shit, do ya?
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我操，你该不会真喜欢这种狗屎玩意吧？

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Niko, why do you wanna leave so early? You didn't touch one of the girls did ya? I wanna go back there.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~Niko，你怎么这么快就走了？你都没摸过姑娘吧？我想再回去玩会儿。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Alright man. This fucker better be funny.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~好吧，兄弟。这逼最好能有趣点。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~I ain't got the patience to be waiting, Niko. Let's go.
~z~I can give you three reasons, but the fact that you're the ugliest man I've ever seen should be enough of one.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我可以给你三个理由，但事实上你是我见过的最丑的人，这就够了。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~You got fucking lucky, Niko. Shit, I hate bowling.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~你丫运气真好，Niko。操，我讨厌保龄球。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~I had some fun, Niko. Speak to you soon.
~z~You fancy motherfucker. America has really got to you, hasn't it?
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~你这花哨狗逼。已经是个美国人了是吧？

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~There you are. Let's move out.
FCP_ACT_DIFF_DARTS_YES
FCP_ACT_BORED_TAKEHOME
~z~What you playing at Niko? I ain't doing this shit.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~你是作弄谁呢，Niko？这种事我可不干。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Hey man, this a joke? It ain't a funny one if it is. I'm not going in.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~嘿，兄弟，你开玩笑吗？这可不好笑。我不会进去的。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~That was a good craic, man. Catch you round.
~z~Alright Niko, you won. If you try to rub me face in it. Things ain't gonna be pretty.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~好吧，Niko，你赢了。要是你想骑我头上，就有你好看。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_LEAVE_SHOW_CABARET
FCP_ACT_BOWL_LEAVE_DRAW
~z~What's up man, so er, we're gonna need some wheels.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~你好啊，兄弟。那个...我们得弄辆车。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~I don't care if she's your girlfriend. That don't stop her being uglier than sin.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我才不管她是不是你女友。那也改变不了她比罪孽还丑陋的事实。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Okay, Niko. This place ain't too shabby. It ain't too shabby at all.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~好吧，Niko。这地方还不算太烂。真的不能算太烂。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Couldn't hack the pressure, eh Niko? Had to duck out of the game of pool early. That's cool.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~顶不住压力了吧，嗯Niko？只能提前开溜了对吧。没事。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~There's me man, Niko. Come on.
~z~You wanted me to press my body up against you, didn't you? Let's go.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~你就是想让我贴在你身上是吧？走吧。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Fuck, I got better things to do than wait for you. Now we got to look for a car as well.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~操，比起等你我本来有更好的事情可做。现在我们还得去找辆车。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Top prize for being an asshole goes to Niko. You made us miss the damn show.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~为人混蛋一等奖颁给Niko。被你搞得错过演出了。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~You're a fucking loser cunt and you know it.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~你丫就是个屌丝lowB，你自己也知道。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_TAKEHOME
~z~Later on, man. Call me.
FCP_ACT_ARRIVE_PUB_FAVOURITE
~z~You know I'm gonna destroy you at darts. It's going to happen, Niko.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~要知道，我玩飞镖可是碾压你的。会碾压的，Niko。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Jesus Niko, waiting for your Slavic ass ain't fun at all. Come on.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~天哪，Niko，等你这个斯拉夫混蛋可不好玩。走了。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Fucking darts? It ain't what I signed on for but I'm game.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~改玩飞镖了？这跟说好的不一样，不过也行。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_DARTS_LEAVE_DRAW
FCP_ACT_ARRIVE_DARTS
~z~A fuckin chopper? Man, you a player!
~z~Fuck you. I'd spill your drinks again if I had the fucking chance.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~操你妈，要是老子有机会，还会把你的酒都倒了。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Your pissing around has made us miss the fucking show. Nice one, Niko.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~你丫到处乱跑搞得我们错过演出了。很好，Niko。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Shit, I love that shit hole. They gotta put something in the drinks there. I'm screwed.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我操，我喜欢这家店。酒水里肯定下了料。我不行了。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Niko, I'm bored as fuck. Take me home.
~z~Niko, you beat me at pool. That don't make you a better man.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~Niko，你台球打赢我了。不过这也没法让你变好。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~You ready to get your ass thrashed at darts, then?
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~准备好在飞镖上输得底裤都不剩了吗？

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~We ain't interested in you like that ladies.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我们不像那些女士一样对你感兴趣。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_LEAVE_STRIP_GOOD
~z~God, I'm gonna have to say a load of Hail Marys after the thoughts I was thinking in there.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~上帝啊，在店里胡思乱想了那么多，我得念上很多遍万福玛利亚了。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_BORED_LEAVING
~z~This place, eh Niko? If here's you're place then let's do it. It's all the same to me when I'm wasted anyway.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~这家店吗，Niko？确定的话我们就进去吧。反正我都能喝个大醉。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_DARTS_LEAVE_LOST
~z~I think that following us out here proves my point. You are fucking stupid.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我想跟着我们出来就证明了我的观点。你丫就是傻逼。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_POOL_LEAVE_LOST
~z~Shit Niko, it wouldn't have taken much longer to finish a game of darts.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我靠，Niko，投一局飞镖又不用花多久。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~That place is fucking awesome. I can't nearly see.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~那家店太他妈爽了，我都快看不清了。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Fine, Niko. You wanna quit that's okay. I'm gonna count it as a win for me.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~行吧，Niko。你不想打了也行。那就算我赢了。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Pair of transexuals seem to be following us!
~z~A bike, you better be able to drive it, Niko. Let's go.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~摩托车，你会不会骑啊，Niko。我们走吧。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~I don't like losing, Niko. If you weren't such a gracious winner I might have got real angry.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我不喜欢失败，Niko。要不是因为你是个如此谦和的赢家，我就要生气了。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_DARTS_LEAVE_WON
FCP_ACT_POOL_LEAVE_DRAW
~z~When you don't wanna be somewhere you just cut lose, don't ya?
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~你不想去什么地方的时候就会止损，对吧？

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Alright, man. There are better places to get a drink in this city but a drink's a drink, you know?
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~行吧，兄弟。城里还有更好的地方可以喝酒，但总归是有酒喝的，懂吧？

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~That's funny.
FCP_ACT_ARRIVE_SHOW_LATE
~z~Fuck me, I didn't know they had this kind of thing in Liberty City.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我操，自由城里居然还有这种东西。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Okay Niko, you need me to explain what anything means, just ask.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~好了，Niko，有什么没听懂的就问我吧。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~I'm nearly bursting , Niko. This is gonna be fucking great.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我快顶不住了，Niko。这里最好够爽。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Niko, what the fuck man? Why's this taking so long.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~Niko，搞毛啊老兄？怎么会花这么久。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~I don't remember agreeing to a game of pool. Was I drunk?
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我不记得我答应的是打台球啊。是我醉了吗？

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Take me back to the house.
~z~I'm getting bored, man. If we don't get there soon I'm gonna have to start hitting the yayo.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我开始无聊了，兄弟。再没到地方，我就要开始嗑药了。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_ARRIVEF_NOTLATE
FCP_ACT_ARRIVE_SHOW_COMEDY
~z~The best man won, Niko. Don't think anyone's gonna dispute that are they?
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~强者胜出，Niko。没人会反驳的，不是吗？

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Tie game, Niko. Tie game. We're a good match, a good match.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~平局，Niko，平局啊。旗鼓相当，旗鼓相当。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Shit, Niko. I'll find me own damn way home then.
~z~He's a fuckin' genius.
~z~I'm in, man. I'm fucking in. Let's go.
FCP_ACT_LEAVE_PUB_GENERIC
~z~You assholes are starting to annoy me.
FCP_ACT_ARRIVEF_LATE
~z~That wasn't too bad. If I'd had a few more rails beforehand it might a been even better.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~还不错。要是我事前能多吸点粉就更好了。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Niko, Niko, you come up against the best, you can't expect to win. Bad luck man.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~Niko，Niko，挑战了最强的选手就别想赢了。运气不行啊兄弟。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_DURING_SHOW_POS
~z~You're fucking late, you dick head. Let's go.
~z~I don't get it.
~z~Alright Niko, enough's enough. Take me home.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~好了，Niko，够了就是够了。送我回家吧。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_DURING_SHOW_NEG
~z~This is the place, boy. Let's get screwed up.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~这家店好啊，小子，我们开干吧。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~You're a selfish bastard, aren't you? I'll get my self home. Shit.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~你丫是个自私混蛋是吧？我自己回家了。操。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_POOL_LEAVE_WON
~z~That's fucking priceless.
FCP_ACT_LEAVE_SHOW_EARLY
~z~I didn't think we was bowling, fuck it. Let's go.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我们没说要打保龄球吧，算了。走。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~I'm a fucking hustler, Niko. You ain't never gonna beat me at pool.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~老子可是专业的，Niko。你不可能在台球上打败我。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Hey, take me back to Ma's.
FCP_ACT_DROPOFF
~z~Them fucking darts was weighted funny. I shouldn't a lost.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~他们的垃圾飞镖重量不对，不然我能赢的。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~What's taking so long?
FCP_ACT_BOWL_LEAVE_ABANDON
FCP_ACT_BOWL_LEAVE_LOST
~z~What's that about?
FCP_ACT_LEAVE_SHOW_COMEDY
~z~Fuck Niko, I paid to see that shit.
~z~Come on, Niko. Rack 'em up.
~z~Balls in pockets again hey? Alrite why not.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~再来次球球入袋？也不是不行吧。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Let's go bowling, Niko.
~z~Drop me at Ma's, will ya?
FCP_ACT_ARRIVEH_NOTLATE
FCP_ACT_LEAVE_CLUB_FAVOURITE
FCP_ACT_POOL_LEAVE_ABANDON
~z~I guess they don't got darts where you're from. It's an Irishman's game.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我猜你老家没有飞镖。这是爱尔兰人的游戏。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_ARRIVE_SHOW_CABARET
FCP_ACT_ARRIVE_STRIP
~z~Fuck, we coulda finished the game. I was starting to get a feel for it.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~操蛋，我们可以投完整局的，我都有手感了。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Jesus Christ. That what you guys watch on TV where you come from?
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~我的天哪，你们老家的电视就播这种东西？

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Come on, Niko. If I wanted to do this I'd ask to do it.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~拜托，Niko，想来这里的话我会主动提的。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_ARRIVE_LATE
~z~So, it was a tie. I guess we're evenly matched.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~那就是平手了。我想我们是旗鼓相当。

FCPAAUD.original: FCP_ACT_ARRIVEC_NOTLATE
~z~Bad luck Niko, you might win if they let you shoot the board.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~运气不行啊，Niko。要是给你打到了，真有可能会赢。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Man, I just don't like stopping once I've started. I could drink all fucking night.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~兄弟，一开始喝酒就停不下来了，我他妈能喝一整晚。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~That was alright Niko. The man can tell a joke.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~还算不错吧，Niko。这人挺会讲笑话的。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~I never liked bowling anyway.
~z~Alright man, we're here. Let's bowl.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~好了，兄弟，我们到了。开始打球吧。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Alright, Niko. We good to go.
FCP_ACT_ARRIVE_POOL
FCP_ACT_DIFF_BOWL_YES
FCP_ACT_DIFF_ACTIVITY_NO
~z~You're a fucking prick, Niko. Get us there alright.
FCPAAUD.translated: ~z~你他妈就是个屌人，Niko。赶紧上路吧。

FCPAAUD.original: ~z~Dumb pricks!
